trans-unit.source: Defines the reader, writer, and methods for pre-generated, typed serializers.

To improve the performance of XML serialization, you can generate assemblies before serialization using the [XML Serializer Generator Tool (Sgen.exe)](~/docs/framework/serialization/xml-serializer-generator-tool-sgen-exe.md).

When such an assembly is loaded, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the properties of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation> interface to query the contained serializer or serializers.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation"></xref> class.
Gets a value that determines whether a type can be serialized.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to be serialized.
`true` if the type can be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a serializer for the specified type.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to be serialized.
An instance of a type derived from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> class.
Gets the XML reader object that is used by the serializer.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader"></xref> that is used to read an XML document or data stream.
Gets the collection of methods that is used to read a data stream.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the methods.
Gets the collection of typed serializers that is found in the assembly.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the typed serializers.
Get the collection of methods that is used to write to a data stream.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the methods.
Gets the XML writer object for the serializer.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter"></xref> that is used to write to an XML data stream or document.
